•EVA
Prior to Reaching Sewers Exit
After sewers call - head north

EVA

Snake, forgive me. The escape route I set up has been cut off.

EVA

They've already sent units out to hunt you down. And they've got attack dogs with them...

EVA

There's a way out of the sewers to the north. Head north as fast as you can!
Sewers - escape hint

EVA

There's no way to get past the iron grates blocking the passageways.

EVA

But there are a lot of side ducts connecting the passageways together. Crawl through those ducts to get around the grates.
Sewers - watch out for dogs

EVA

Snake, watch out. The search party has released attack dogs into the sewers.

EVA

Without any decent weapons, it's too dangerous to take those dogs on in a fight.

EVA

Don't even think about fighting the attack dogs. Your only concern right now is to get away. Head north!
•Para-Medic
Prior to Reaching Sewers Exit
Sewers - dogs
(1)

PARA-MEDIC

The enemy has sent out attack dogs after you. You won't stand a chance against them in your present state. Just keep running north!

You might be able to distract the attack dogs by throwing food at them. Give it a shot!
•The Sorrow Battle
Near-death experience hint
*Heard first time player selects Continue

ZERO

Snake, wake up! Open your eyes!!
Near-death experience obvious hint
*Heard third time player selects Continue

ZERO

Snake! Wake up! The revival pill! Use the revival pill on the Game Over screen!!
•Major
Prior to Rendezvous with EVA Behind Waterfall
After near-death experience

ZERO

Snake.

SNAKE

... (His mind's wandering.)

ZERO

Snake!

SNAKE

Wh-what... oh, Major... What do you want?

ZERO

What happened? You've been acting strangely ever since you were washed down the river.

SNAKE

I'm fine.

ZERO

I disagree.

SNAKE

Really?

ZERO

Yes.

SNAKE

...

ZERO

Did something happen to you in that river?

SNAKE

No...

ZERO

Don't lie, Snake. I'm trying to help you.

SNAKE

... All right. But you might not believe me when I tell you.

ZERO

I'll believe it. I trust you.

SNAKE

Ok, then. When I was in that river...

ZERO

Yes?

SNAKE

I saw... the other side.

ZERO

The other side?

SNAKE

Yeah.

ZERO

*weirded out* ... And by the other side, you mean...?

SNAKE

Well, the world of the dead... I guess.

ZERO

*totally weirded out* ...

SNAKE

And The Sorrow was there. He was sad... no, more than that. He said I was part of his sorrow...

ZERO

I... see... Um, Snake, would you excuse me for a moment?

SNAKE

Huh? Sure...

ZERO

Para-Medic, what in the hell is wrong with Snake?

PARA-MEDIC

Beats me... Maybe he got a nasty bump on the head.

ZERO

... You really think that's all?

PARA-MEDIC

What are you implying?

SNAKE

Major?

ZERO

I mean, he's always been a little bit... different... I thought maybe...

PARA-MEDIC

Good point... I was just thinking that myself.

SNAKE

MAJOR!

ZERO

Wh--what is it, Snake?

SNAKE

I can hear you.

ZERO

!! W... well, in any case, I'm glad you're all right.

PARA-MEDIC

Y... yeah. Me, too. It's good to see you're back to ah... normal...

SNAKE

...
Head for the back of the waterfall

ZERO

The waterfall where EVA said she'd meet you is up ahead to the north. Head that direction.
If player still hasn't removed transmitter after near-death experience
(1)

ZERO

Snake, are you being pursued by the enemy?

SNAKE

Yeah. It's the Ocelot unit.

ZERO

Even taking into account the time you were unconscious, it's still too early for them to have caught up to you.

ZERO

It's almost as if they know exactly where you are...
(2)

ZERO

In any case, you can't launch a counterattack until you meet EVA and get your gear back. Just shake them off and head behind the waterfall!
•EVA
Prior to Rendezvous with EVA Behind Waterfall
After near-death experience – head behind the waterfall
(1)

EVA

That area is known as Tikhogornyj. It means "the tranquil mountain ridge" in Russian.

EVA

Like the name says, it's the most beautiful riverbank in the region of Groznyj Grad.
(2)

EVA

If you go upstream, you'll come to a waterfall. I'll meet you in the cave behind that waterfall. Make your way up the river.
After near-death experience – transmitter still embedded
(1)

EVA

Snake, are you being pursued by the enemy?

SNAKE

Yeah. It's the Ocelots again.

EVA

They shouldn't have been able to catch up with you this fast. It's almost as if they know your exact position...
(2)

EVA

Anyway, hurry to the waterfall. Once we meet up, we can do something about those enemies on your tail. Keep heading up the river!
Section 6
Rendezvous with EVA Behind Waterfall – End of Colonel Volgin Battle
Snake heads upriver to link up with EVA.
*If player enters cutscene in Normal Phase
Snake shakes off his pursuers and makes it to the waterfall. He then enters the cave behind it.
Waterfall Rendezvous with EVA
3D Cutscene 1 (Normal Phase)
3D cutscene (afternoon - change view button available)
Snake enters the cave behind the waterfall basin. He's soaked.
In front of a door there are remnants of a fire. It looks like someone has been making camp here—that someone is EVA. She uses this place regularly.
The radio (vacuum tube type) she uses to contact the KGB is sitting around.
All of a sudden, there's the roar of a bike engine! Snake turns around.
EVA comes bursting through the waterfall on her bike.
She slams on the brakes in front of the door, spinning the front wheel and coming to a stop right in front of Snake.
EVA takes off her helmet. She's still dressed as Tatyana. Having just driven through the waterfall, she's pretty wet. She isn't wearing her glasses, and her bangs are down. The only part of her that says "EVA" is her high-laced boots. Water drips off her body.

EVA

Nice to meet you, Snake. I'm Tatyana...
Snake lowers his gun (revolver). EVA gets off the bike and tosses a soaking wet backpack onto the ground.

EVA

Here's your equipment.

SNAKE

EVA, you could use a towel.

EVA

So could you.
EVA cracks a smile.
*If player enters cutscene in Alert Phase
Snake makes it to the waterfall, the enemy still hot on his heels. He jumps behind it anyway.
Waterfall Rendezvous with EVA
3D Cutscene 2 (Alert Phase)
(Behind waterfall - afternoon - change view button available)
With the in-game Alert Phase music (or an arranged version of it) playing, Snake enters the cave behind the waterfall basin. He's soaked. Water drips off of him.
Snake quickly looks around the area.
It looks like someone has been making camp here—that someone is EVA. She uses this place regularly.
Snake crouches down and prepares to engage anyone coming in after him.
Suddenly, from beyond the waterfall comes gunfire, screams, flashes of light. (EVA has taken care of the soldiers who were after Snake,)
Then, there's the roar of a bike engine! EVA comes bursting through the waterfall on her bike.
She slams on the brakes in front of the door, spinning the front wheel and coming to a stop right in front of Snake.
EVA takes off her helmet. She's still dressed as Tatyana. Having just driven through the waterfall, she's pretty wet. She isn't wearing her glasses, and her bangs are down. The only part of her that says "EVA" is her high-laced boots. Water drips off her body.

EVA

Nice to meet you, Snake. I'm Tatyana...
Snake lowers his gun (revolver). EVA gets off the bike and tosses a soaking wet backpack onto the ground.

EVA

Here's your equipment.

SNAKE

EVA, you could use a towel.

EVA

So could you.
EVA cracks a smile.
Waterfall Rendezvous with EVA
3D Cutscene 3
Snake and EVA are around a campfire. The flames from the fire illuminate their bodies. An unusually peaceful mood hangs in the air.
Snake is still naked and covered in wounds. The camera is positioned behind him.
EVA is in her underwear. Her Tatyana uniform is drying off.
The carcass of a snake is cooking on a stick. There are fish too.
Snake eats some snake.

SNAKE

*eating with considerable vigor*
EVA doesn't eat.
Though taken aback by Snake's appetite, she watches him affectionately.
The camera shows Snake's right eye. It has an eyepatch over it (EVA brought it).
Snake holds out the snake and offers it to EVA, who still isn't eating.

SNAKE

Want some?

EVA

No, thanks.

SNAKE

Don't like snakes?

EVA

Not for dinner.
EVA is coy, what with the connection to Snake himself. Exaggerated.

SNAKE

Didn't you have to eat them (during training) at the KGB?

EVA

In my training we always got the good stuff. French, Italian...that kind of thing... (Trained in haute cuisine.)

SNAKE

A regular Mata Hari1. (Since she's a spy.)

EVA

The least you could do is call me Cynthia2. (A spy in the 50s.)
Foreshadowing the event where the player has to save EVA at the end of the game. The player will need to use the Survival Viewer to treat her. When doing so, they can look at a list of all the food she has eaten. Despite being in a battleground, she's been eating nothing but the best.

SNAKE

Tell me something. How does it feel to spy on your own country?
She's a KGB spy who's spying on a member of the GRU, her comrades.

EVA

I can't say it feels good. But it's my job (mission).

SNAKE

Can't even eat a snake during a mission, huh...
EVA grins as though she's been waiting for this opportunity.

EVA

I wouldn't mind eating you.
EVA approaches Snake, her cleavage really standing out!
The "Snake Eater" theme starts to play.

SNAKE

*swallows hard* ...
Snake says nothing.
EVA smiles.

EVA

When this mission's over, you'll have to treat me to a nice dinner.

SNAKE

What do you want to eat?

EVA

Let's see... How about sushi?
Sushi started to spread from the 60s. The California roll was invented in California during this decade too.

SNAKE

Sushi?

EVA

It's Japanese. I hear it's all the rage right now. Supposedly it's made from raw fish.
Snake holds up what he's eating.

SNAKE

Raw fish? Just the place for my survival techniques. (I think I could live there.)

EVA

*smiles*

SNAKE

*slight smile*
A butterfly flies in front of Snake's face.
He reaches out to grab it, but he has no depth perception now.
The scene takes a turn. The atmosphere is different, unpleasant.

EVA

Snake?
EVA looks sad. She cozies up to Snake.
EVA touches his eyepatch.

EVA

Thank you, Snake. I'll be your eyes from now on.
She kisses it, his forehead, then his mouth.
A tear falls down her face.

EVA

Thank you.

EVA

Snake...
EVA leans in to Snake. She takes his hand and places it on her body.
It's looking like they could go all the way.

EVA

*breathing sounds as she kisses Snake's eyepatch, forehead, and cheek* (Snake rejects her.)
But Snake pulls back. EVA is disconsolate.

SNAKE

Don't worry about it.

EVA

Are you all right?

SNAKE

It's not like I can't see. I've got one good eye, and can still fire a gun.
He looks at his palm.

EVA

Really? Good.
*If transmitter is still embedded-->Waterfall EVA Rendezvous 3D Cutscene 4
*If transmitter has already been removed-->Waterfall EVA Rendezvous 3D Cutscene 5
Waterfall Rendezvous with EVA
3D Cutscene 4
This is for players who haven't removed the transmitter. EVA forcibly removes it here.
Snake and EVA are around the campfire. The flames from the fire illuminate their bodies.

EVA

Snake, come here for a minute...
Snake moves toward EVA. The angle is positioned with the campfire in front of the shot. We can't get a clear look for the flames.
What follows unfolds like a radio drama. Voices only.

EVA

There's something in here... It's so hard... (She's found the transmitter.)

SNAKE

When did it get like that...?

EVA

Hold still.

EVA

Let me do it (remove the transmitter).

SNAKE

You know, I've been trained to do this kind of thing (remove a transmitter) myself...

EVA

Just relax and let me handle it.

SNAKE

OK...

EVA

I can't believe how small it (the transmitter) is...

SNAKE

Yeah, but it (the transmitter) gets the job done...

EVA

Really? Here, lift up your hips...

SNAKE

Like this?

EVA

Yeah.

EVA

... How's that?

SNAKE

You're pretty good at that (at removing transmitters buried in wounds).

EVA

Yeah, everybody tells me that. (She received medical training from the KGB too.)

SNAKE

*groans*

EVA

Hold steady. I'm not done yet.

SNAKE

*screams*

EVA

There! A transmitter.

SNAKE

Is that how they do it in the KGB?

EVA

Sometimes. Would you rather I did it American style?

SNAKE

Mmm... but how'd you know there was a transmitter lodged there? That's some female intuition you've got.
The transmitter is tossed into the campfire.
Waterfall Rendezvous with EVA
3D Cutscene 5
Water is thrown on the fire to extinguish it. Time passes. The branching path for the transmitter removal cutscene rejoins here. They're both dressed and are adjusting and checking their gear.

SNAKE

EVA, didn't you steal some explosives out of the fortress?
Snake gets down to business and talks about the mission.

EVA

C3, a highly potent explosive from the West.

EVA

It can be molded into any shape, like clay.

EVA

With just this much, you could blow up the Shagohod and the lab along with it.

SNAKE

Is that right?

EVA

Yeah, but there's a trick to using it.

SNAKE

Tell me about it.
EVA gives Snake half the C3.
She then breaks off a piece of the C3 and molds it.
She shows Snake the heart she made from it.

EVA

Well, what do you think?
Snake takes it. He'll use this clay-shaped heart later on.
Waterfall Rendezvous with EVA
3D Cutscene 6
Cutscene showing the hangar.
We see what it's like inside.

EVA

The Shagohod's booster unit uses liquid fuel. The fuel tanks are in the main wing of the weapons lab... in the hangar housing the Shagohod itself.
The fuel contains kerosene, an oxidizing agent, and liquid oxygen. Sigint provides details over radio.

SNAKE

So I should blow up the tanks?

EVA

That's the basic idea. It should be enough to blow up the entire hangar.

EVA

There are four fuel tanks. In order to destroy the hangar, you'll have to set explosives on each of those tanks.

SNAKE

All four of them?

EVA

It should be no sweat for you. Besides, the scientists have the day off today.

SNAKE

So the hangar's completely deserted?

EVA

Not quite. They've still got guards posted there.

SNAKE

Hmm. So what do I do after I set the C3?

EVA

The bombs run off a timer. Once the timer has been set, the countdown will begin. When the timer reaches zero, the bombs will all go off at once.

SNAKE

How long do I have?
*Varies according to difficulty

EVA

5 minutes

EVA

7 minutes

EVA

10 minutes

EVA

15 minutes

EVA

20 minutes

EVA

Once the Phase 2 trials are finished, I wouldn't be surprised if they kill all the scientists to prevent them from talking. So you've got to act fast!

SNAKE

I'll take care of it.
Waterfall Rendezvous with EVA
3D Cutscene 7
Back to behind the waterfall.

SNAKE

EVA, did you get the data on the Shagohod from Sokolov?

EVA

Yeah. That's the mission I was given.

SNAKE

By Khrushchev?

EVA

Uh huh. America doesn't have any use for it does it?

SNAKE

?

EVA

But I haven't forgotten my other mission, either.

EVA

Helping you out.
Waterfall Rendezvous with EVA
3D Cutscene 8

EVA

Follow this cave and go up the ladder at the end. You'll come out inside Groznyj Grad, just southwest of the weapons lab.
The camera shows the relevant part of the main wing.

EVA

Do you remember when you went to rescue Sokolov? Remember there was a locked door when you entered the main wing from the second floor of the east wing?

SNAKE

Yeah.

EVA

That's the entrance to the Shagohod's hangar.
Waterfall Rendezvous with EVA
3D Cutscene 9
EVA gives Snake the key.

EVA

Use this key to open that door.

SNAKE

The door right when I entered the main wing. Got it.

SNAKE

What about you?

EVA

I'll get things ready for our escape. There's a rail bridge to the north. I'm going to set a bomb there, so I'm taking half of the C3 with me.

SNAKE

Right. I'll set off the weapons lab, then. Try not to be in the neighborhood when it happens.

EVA

Gotcha.
Despite saying this, EVA goes to the hangar anyway.
The reason being to steal the microfilm from Volgin's safe. After this cutscene, she plants the bombs on the bridge, then heads for the safe.

SNAKE

And watch out for Ocelot. He suspects you're not who you say you are.

EVA

Don't worry. The Colonel still trusts me...

EVA

And I have my ways.
EVA twists her body.

EVA

There's not a man alive who can resist my charms..

SNAKE

*astounded, but he doesn't go along with it*

EVA

Besides you, of course.

SNAKE

I'm just warning you, EVA, that's all.

EVA

I know. OK, let's go.
EVA gets on the bike. She's dressed as Tatyana. Her bangs are up too.
She starts the bike.
Seeing her about to leave on her bike, Snake mentions something.

SNAKE

You seem like you were born on one of those.
EVA smiles.

EVA

If I didn't ride every day, I couldn't go on living.

SNAKE

?
Snake doesn't understand.

EVA

When I'm riding, the wind hits me so hard that it hurts.
EVA takes her hands off the handles and holds her arms like she's giving herself a hug.

EVA

That pain keeps my mind off the pain of having to be someone else.

EVA

It's not easy always fooling myself like this (even though I've been trained to do it).

EVA

It's only when I'm on the bike... that I'm free to be the real me.
She grips the handles tight and looks ahead.

EVA

I only get off my bike (when she returns to who she truly is) when I fall in love... or fall dead...

SNAKE

What's your name?

EVA

Tatyana.

SNAKE

No, your real name.
EVA puts on her Tatyana disguise glasses like she's putting on a pair of sunglasses.

EVA

*chuckles*

EVA

What's wrong with Tanya?
Snake is impressed with EVA for not telling him her real name. (She's being true to her job as a spy.)

SNAKE

OK, Tanya. Don't let anyone see you.
EVA presses the shutter button for a hidden camera placed in her Tatyana uniform. It makes a noise.
Snake hears the sound of the shutter.

SNAKE

?

EVA

Oh, this? It's a button camera.

SNAKE

What did you do that for?

EVA

Insurance (photographic evidence). To make sure you don't double cross me...
EVA puts on her helmet.
She turns her bike around toward the waterfall.

SNAKE

Hey (EVA)!

EVA

What!?
She can't hear him for the helmet.

SNAKE

You're gonna get wet again!
EVA gives a little nod, then lets out the throttle.
The bike comes flying through the waterfall!
Having met back up with EVA and recovered his gear, Snake continues through the cave behind the waterfall. At the end of it is a long ladder leading up to the fortress interior. He climbs it.
Fortress Infiltration
3D Cutscene 1
(Ladder - afternoon - change view button unavailable)
Snake climbs the ladder leading back up to the fortress.
He comes to a manhole. He opens the cover, emerging in front of the parked tanks.
This is a different manhole from the one leading from The Fury's underground tunnel.
Snake checks the area before coming out the manhole. He hides behind the nearest tank.
Then, an armored vehicle comes backing in, parking over the manhole he just came out from. Its massive wheel prevents any attempt from opening it back up. The player can't backtrack.
It isn't snowing this time. It was night during the first infiltration, this time it's day. An attractive sequence utilizing daytime visuals.
Snake infiltrates Groznyj Grad once more. He slips past the base's defenses, making it to the weapons lab main wing where the Shagohod is being kept. Major Zero contacts him.
Hangar Infiltration
Radio Call 1
(mandatory incoming call)

ZERO

Snake, I see you've managed to sneak into the hangar.

SNAKE

Yeah. The Shagohod's in here.

ZERO

The completed Phase 2 Shagohod represents a grave threat to the West. We can't allow it to be mass-produced. You've got to destroy it.

SNAKE

EVA's got the data on the Shagohod. Do you think that's safe?

ZERO

I wouldn't exactly say it's safe. But Khrushchev is a shrewd leader. I can't imagine he'd use it for anything other than deterrence.

ZERO

Volgin, however, is a different story. He's planning to use the Shagohod to turn the Cold War into a blazing hot one. We can't let him have it.

SNAKE

Agreed.

ZERO

That leaves just one more mission for you to carry out...

SNAKE

(Killing) The Boss...?

ZERO

Exactly.

SNAKE

...

ZERO

For now, just focus on destroying the Shagohod.

SNAKE

... Yes, sir.

ZERO

I'll let Sigint fill you in on how to destroy it.

SIGINT

Yo. Like EVA was saying, if you're looking to blow the whole place sky high, the best way is to take out those liquid fuel tanks with the C3.
Radio Miniscreen: A tank.

SIGINT

You know there's four tanks in there, right! You have to put C3 on all four of them.

SIGINT

To plant a C3 charge, all you gotta do is equip the C3 and press the Weapon button while standing in front of a tank.

SNAKE

Just like TNT.

SIGINT

But, uh, make sure you don't plant it in the wrong place. You barely got enough C3 as it is, right?

SNAKE

Good point. I'll make sure not to plant it anywhere else. (Explaining to the player they can only plant C3 on the tanks.)

SIGINT

Good, man.

SIGINT

And be careful. Liquid fuel has a nasty habit of going off at the slightest shock. So don't go using any heavy firepower near the tanks unless you're aiming to get yourself barbecued.

SNAKE

I'll keep that in mind...

SIGINT

The C3 charges all have to go off at once if you want to bring down the hangar in one fell swoop. So if I were you, I'd wait until after you plant the last charge to start the timer mechanism.

SNAKE

All right. I'll make sure I finish planting all four charges before I start the timer.
*For the different difficulties

SIGINT

Once the timer's set, you've got 5 minutes until it explodes, right?

SIGINT

Once the timer's set, you've got 7 minutes until it explodes, right?

SIGINT

Once the timer's set, you've got 10 minutes until it explodes, right?

SIGINT

Once the timer's set, you've got 15 minutes until it explodes, right?

SIGINT

Once the timer's set, you've got 20 minutes until it explodes, right?

SIGINT

So make sure you get your ass out of that place by then.

SIGINT

I think that's about all I've got. The rest is up to you. Good luck, pal.

ZERO

We're counting on you, Snake.
Once Snake has planted two C3 charges, he gets a call from EVA.
Half of Explosives Planted
Radio Call
(mandatory incoming call)

EVA

Snake?

SNAKE

Eva...

EVA

I've finished planting the bomb on the rail bridge. If we get rid of the bridge, the enemy won't be able to follow us. That should at least buy us some time. I've also set up the escape route. How are things going on your end?

SNAKE

I just finished planting the second charge. Give me a little more time.

EVA

OK. I'll be waiting for you at the bridge.
Following this, EVA will be unreachable on the radio. The reason being she is sneaking off to Volgin's safe to look for the Legacy.
Snake continues to avoid the enemy and finishes planting all four C3s.
All Explosives Planted
3D Cutscene 1
3D cutscene (afternoon - change view button available)
Since we don't know which fuel tank will be the last one, we'll create cutscenes for all four tanks.
During gameplay, the player can plant the C3 anywhere on the tank, but this spot will not be reflected in the cutscene that follows. (In other words, no matter where you plant the C3 on the tank, when the cutscene plays it will always be planted at a fixed spot.)
Snake activates the C3.
The timer starts counting down from 5:00 (5 minutes).
Snake takes out the last, heart-shaped C3 (fragment) that he got from EVA.
He looks at the heart and smiles (it reminds him of EVA). But then he stops and remolds the C3. The camera doesn't show his hands.
Snake holds the completed C3 (clay art) between his fingers. The heart is now in the shape of a butterfly. Snake brings the butterfly up to his eye. He then throws it into the air.

SNAKE

Gotcha this time!
A little smile creeps onto Snake's face. He grabs the butterfly as it drops and crushes it in his hand, then sticks it onto the bomb.
Snake then calls Major Zero!
All Explosives Planted
Radio Call 1
(mandatory incoming call)

SNAKE

Major, I finished planting the C3. I'm on my way out now.

ZERO

Hurry Snake!
This is for any players who think 5 minutes is more than enough time.
If they end up starting the Volgin fight with less than a minute left, they may struggle to complete it.

ZERO

Is EVA taking care of the escape route?
The escape route is reviewed here so the player is aware of it.

SNAKE

Yeah.

ZERO

Are you sure?

SNAKE

She can handle it.
*If player has tried to call EVA and gotten "NO RESPONSE"

ZERO

She's been out of radio contact for some time now...

SNAKE

She'll come through... I know she will.

ZERO

All right, then. Well, hurry up and get out of there.
Having finished planting the C3, Snake hurries to the hangar exit.
Prior to Volgin Battle
3D Cutscene 1
3D cutscene (afternoon - change view button available)
Here is the secret with this cutscene. The C3 explosives timer continues to count down, even during this long cutscene. The player needs to secure enough time for the cutscene + Volgin battle. The player can skip the cutscene. To see how much time is left, they can press the First Person View Button anytime during the cutscene to see The Sorrow displaying the time. If time runs out, the game is over, even if the cutscene is still playing.
Shagohod hangar exit. It's an open space offering a view of the entire machine.
Snake reaches the exit. He hears Volgin's voice.

VOLGIN

Snake!!
Snake looks in the direction it came from.
EVA lies unconscious in front of the Shagohod. She isn't tied up. She's wearing her Tatyana outfit, her glasses are gone, and her hair is down (the way EVA wears it). Her high-laced boots are also EVA's.
Next to EVA is the encrypted radio (vacuum tube) she's been using to contact the KGB.
Volgin and Ocelot stand in front of EVA.
Snake immediately aims his gun.
But then, an arm reaches out from right beside him and throws him easily. Snake hits the ground hard.

SNAKE

*groans*
The Boss appears before Snake.

THE BOSS

Why'd you come back?
Snake gets up and gets into a CQC fight with The Boss.
This exchange is a great demonstration of CQC. One attacks with it, the other counters with it!
In the end, however, Snake is the loser.

SNAKE

*groans*
Prior to Volgin Battle
3D Cutscene 2
One of Ocelot's revolvers is pointed at Snake's head.
Snake isn't tied up.
Volgin begins his speech in front of Snake.
Volgin wanders around near EVA's body.

VOLGIN

This woman was found snooping around my underground vault.

VOLGIN

When she was captured, look what we found on her.
Volgin presents the microfilm.

VOLGIN

The Philosophers' Legacy.

VOLGIN

This microfilm contains all the information regarding the Legacy. You might say that this film itself is the Philosophers' Legacy.
Ocelot brags to Snake.

OCELOT

It was the smell that gave her away.
Snake is about to say something, but Ocelot cuts him off.

OCELOT

No. Not the perfume.
Ocelot sniffs.

OCELOT

It was gasoline. Motorcycle gasoline. She reeked of it.

VOLGIN

To think that lovely Tatyana was a spy...
Volgin looks at the radio on the ground next to EVA as he speaks.

VOLGIN

We found this radio along with her too.
Volgin looks at EVA's face and body as though he can still taste them.

VOLGIN

Such a fine woman she was...

VOLGIN

It almost pains me to have to kill her...
Volgin is alluding to the indecent things he did with EVA.

VOLGIN

*laughs as he reminisces about crude acts*
Snake can't bear to hear Volgin refer to them.

VOLGIN

Yes, she was an obedient one.

VOLGIN

She was my precious little pet.
Volgin gives EVA's stomach a kick with all his might!

EVA

*screams*

VOLGIN

Isn't that right!?
EVA lets out a scream as she regains consciousness.
EVA grits her teeth from the pain. She grips her lipstick gun in her pocket.
EVA mutters something at Volgin with a groan.

EVA

Bastard... (Despite the pain she whispers something like "You bastard" but it's inaudible.)

VOLGIN

What was that? Do you have something to say to me?
Volgin leans down to EVA.

EVA

Go to hell!!
EVA takes her lipstick gun out her pocket and points it in Volgin's face.
But he grabs her arm, then flies into a rage!

VOLGIN

*enraged*
Volgin's arm unleashes electrical arcs! The lipstick gun explodes in EVA's right hand.
The bullet shoots toward the ceiling. Blood drips from her hand. (It was injured in the explosion.)

EVA

*screams*
Volgin lets go of EVA's arm and kicks her again.

VOLGIN

You dirty whore! I've had enough kisses from you!

EVA

*screams*
Losing interest, Volgin steps over EVA.

VOLGIN

I should have known.

VOLGIN

Sokolov wasn't man enough to have a lover like that.

VOLGIN

Just like the KGB to send something so beautiful, yet so deadly.
Snake takes the opportunity to throw a question out there.

SNAKE

What is the Philosophers' Legacy?

VOLGIN

Very well. I'll explain it before I kill you.
Volgin starts to walk. The Boss approaches EVA during Volgin's speech.
Prior to Volgin Battle
Movie Cutscene 1
(Shinkawa Theater)
Shinkawa Theater. Real-life footage would also be fine.
Images from the First World War to during the Second World War. A gathering of the Philosophers.
Images of researchers, the Cobra Unit, etc.
Editor's Note: In the release version, a map, illustrations of the Philosophers, real war footage, and other assets are used instead.

VOLGIN

During the last Great War, the most powerful men in America, China, and the Soviet Union had a secret pact. The pact was a blueprint for defeating the Axis Powers and creating a new world order. To secure victory in the war, the three countries pooled their resources to conduct the most covert types of operations and research - the atomic bomb, rocket technology, the Cobra unit. And they amassed an enormous sum of money to fund these projects. Enough to fight the war five times over... That wealth is the Philosophers' Legacy.

VOLGIN

After the war was won, the three countries were to divide the Philosophers' Legacy amongst themselves. This explains why the United States and the Soviet Union were able to steal away the best scientific minds in Germany as soon as the war ended.

VOLGIN

But our great Motherland has far surpassed its pathetic rivals. We possess enormous wealth, the most advanced technology, and overwhelming power. Assets fitting of our great country.
Shinkawa Theater. Images of gold bullion, famous paintings and treasures of the world. The Cobra Unit, etc.
Editor's Note: In the release version, an illustration of Volgin's father, along with other assets, were used instead.

VOLGIN

My father was one of the men in charge of managing the Philosophers' Legacy. In the confusion that ensued after the war ended, he devised a series of in genious plots to ensure that the Soviet Union would have total control over the Legacy. The money was divided up and laundered through banks all over the world - Switzerland, Australia, and Hong Kong... This microfilm contains a record of all of those transactions.

VOLGIN

After my father's death, I learned of this secret and obtained the microfilm. With this money and the support of Brezhnev and his allies, I built this fortress of Groznyj Grad and Granin's research facility.

VOLGIN

But that worthless fool Granin failed to produce results, and I was forced to turn to Khrushchev's dog Sokolov and his invention - the Shagohod.

VOLGIN

My position in GRU made it too trouble some to attack Sokolov's facility directly. But the spy network established by the secret pact still existed. I used it to contact The Boss and suggested that she defect.

VOLGIN

The Boss was conniving enough to see things my way. The world was once one, but the conflict between the Philosophers has torn it in two. We will use the Legacy to heal that rift and make the world whole again. To do this, we need strength. An unstoppable trump card with enough power to bring order to the world. That trump card was to be the Shagohod...and the Cobra unit.
Prior to Volgin Battle
3D Cutscene 3

VOLGIN

I have lost the Cobras, but I still have the Shagohod and the Legacy. There is nothing America can do to stop us!
Volgin takes out the microfilm indicating where the assets of the Legacy have ended up.

VOLGIN

Boss, take this someplace safe.
The Boss receives the microfilm.
If the player goes into First Person View, they can see The Sorrow behind The Boss. He holds a large, old-fashioned timer (the kind with a bunch of curved lines overlapping) showing the countdown until the bombs detonate.
If the player looks at The Sorrow, he gets startled and the timer stops for a bit? As a way of extending the countdown.
If the player goes into First Person View, they can see the countdown timer. If it reaches zero, we hear the explosions during the cutscene, the screen fades to white, and the game is over. This can happen at any point during the cutscene.

VOLGIN

Take good care of it.
Volgin has entrusted the most formidable warrior to take the microfilm to the most secure location.
The Boss speaks to Volgin.

THE BOSS

He (Snake) wouldn't have come waltzing back in here unless he had a reason.

THE BOSS

The C3's been stolen. He must be planning some sort of sabotage.

THE BOSS

I'll go see if there are any surprises waiting for us.

THE BOSS

I'll dispose of her as well.
The Boss brings EVA to her feet.
EVA resists.
The Boss whispers into her ear.

THE BOSS

*slight lip flaps, speaks in an inaudible voice* Leave everything to me.
EVA looks at her face for a second or two, then complies.
EVA walks off behind The Boss.
If the player goes into First Person View, they can see The Sorrow behind The Boss.
The Boss stops.

THE BOSS

Fight like a warrior, Volgin.

VOLGIN

But of course.
Ocelot and The Boss exchange glances. Ocelot gives a slight nod.
The Boss walks away.

OCELOT

Let me face him.
He gives Snake a little push in the back. Snake totters forward a few steps.
Ocelot is overcome with emotion.

OCELOT

I've been waiting for this moment... Time to get even!
He spins his two revolvers.
Snake turns around and gets into a fighting stance.
Ocelot does an "Uh uh uh!" gesture with his revolvers.

OCELOT

Ahahah. No more judo, and no more field strips.

VOLGIN

Enough of this! He's mine!

VOLGIN

You will stand right there and watch! Got it?
Ocelot implores Volgin once more.

OCELOT

Please, Colonel, let me...!

VOLGIN

Silence!
Electrical arcs of rage are discharged from Volgin's body!
Ocelot draws his guns from their holsters.
Volgin opens his hand. On his palm is a cartridge. He sends out an electrical current, igniting and firing the bullet. It punches a hole in the ground at Ocelot's feet.

OCELOT

Urgh!
Ocelot is annoyed, but he backs down.
Volgin addresses Snake.

VOLGIN

Sorry for the delay. Let's get started shall we?
He throws a switch on a column.
The part of the floor that Snake is standing on starts to descend (it's a cargo lift for accessing the first-floor basement).

VOLGIN

This is a once-in-a-lifetime battle. Let's make it a good one!

VOLGIN

*shouts*
Volgin's jacket is burned away, revealing a crimson rubber suit underneath!
He wears a nondetachable link belt around his shoulder and across his chest.
The belt has massive 7.62mm rifle rounds on it.
Once the elevator has reached the bottom, Volgin jumps down to where Snake is.

VOLGIN

*yells*
Volgin lands.

VOLGIN

It's just you and me now. And I'm going to enjoy this!
Volgin's electricity reaches critical mass! He unleashes it.

OCELOT

Snake!!
Ocelot has Snake's gun and CQC knife. After seeing Volgin nod, he tosses them down to Snake.

VOLGIN

You're mine! Son of The Boss!
A fierce fight between Snake and Volgin ensues, but in the end, Snake gets the better of Volgin.
Volgin Battle Interlude
3D Cutscene 1
3D cutscene (afternoon - change view button available)
Looking like he's going to lose, in an act of cowardice Volgin orders Ocelot to help him. Time continues to count down during this.
Volgin breathes heavily. Snake looks exhausted too. He falls to the ground hard.

VOLGIN

Ugh!
Volgin catches sight of Ocelot. He swallows his pride.

VOLGIN

Shoot him!
Ocelot acts like he didn't hear him.
Snake is confused by Ocelot's attitude.
Volgin points at Ocelot and gives him the order again.

VOLGIN

Do you hear me! I said shoot him!!
Ocelot responds with a cold demeanor.

OCELOT

Sorry Colonel, I'm afraid I can't do that.

VOLGIN

What do you mean, you can't?

OCELOT

I made a promise to The Boss.
Volgin becomes mad.

VOLGIN

Silence!

VOLGIN

I am your commanding officer!
Volgin gets into a combat stance and shoots electricity at Ocelot.
Ocelot aims his revolver and fires off shots in rapid succession.
The electricity electrifies the bullets, with the bullets carrying the electricity off in different directions.
The bullets scattered the electricity, ensuring it missed Ocelot.

VOLGIN

Are you questioning my authority?
Ocelot spins the revolver and holsters it.

OCELOT

Fight like a man, Volgin. (Spoken like an order.)

VOLGIN

Volgin...?
An announcement comes in over the loudspeakers.

INTERCOM

Emergency! Explosives have been detected. All non-EOD personnel must evacuate immediately.
Volgin gives Ocelot another order.

VOLGIN

Ocelot, find those bombs!
Ocelot shows no indication of going.
The announcement plays again!

INTERCOM

Repeat. Explosives have been detected. All non-EOD personnel must evacuate immediately.

VOLGIN

Move it!
Ocelot reluctantly walks off.
He looks at Snake as he walks away. Making sure Volgin can't see him, he does a little "Get him" pose toward Snake. Snake's expression doesn't change.
Volgin gets back into his fighting stance.

VOLGIN

Ready for some more, Snake!?
After another intense battle, Snake finally defeats the Colonel.
Volgin Battle End
3D Cutscene 1
3D cutscene (afternoon - change view button available)
Snake defeats Volgin, but he has to get out of there before the place explodes.
Volgin falls on his face, but he's still alive. He plants his arms in the ground and pushes his body up, then throws up blood!

VOLGIN

*throws up blood*
Snake climbs the emergency ladder back up to the ground floor.
Close-up of the bomb counter! Only 20 seconds left!

INTERCOM

All personnel evacuate! Repeat! All personnel evacuate!!
The alarm continues to blare through the facility!
Snake runs for the exit, leaving Volgin behind!
Another close-up of the timer. 15 seconds left!
Snake keeps running!
Another close-up of the timer. 10 seconds left!
At the hangar exit, soldiers come pouring out the building like baby spiders scurrying. Ocelot is among the personnel.
There are no friends and enemies anymore. People are panicking!
Soldiers' screams (background noise).

SOLDIER 1

Faster! Ahhh...! This way!

SOLDIER 2

Everybody run!! ARGHHH—!! It's gonna blow!

SOLDIER 3

I'm outta here! Let's get out of here quick! AHEEUGH!!

SOLDIER 4

Hurry!! AHHHH—!! We're all gonna die!! Hurry up!! Evacuate!
Another close-up of the timer. Only a few seconds left!
Snake hurries, trying to get as clear of the hangar exit as possible!
Then, a bike with a sidecar suddenly comes to a stop next to him! It's EVA. She has on her spy coveralls. If the player hasn't acquired the RPG, it will be in the sidecar.

EVA

Hop in!
Snake jumps in! The bike takes off!
Another close-up of the timer. Only a few seconds left!
Snake looks back at the hangar.

SNAKE

Step on it!
Another close-up of the timer. The count reaches zero!
The hangar blows up in a massive Hollywood explosion! The ground shakes!
EVA brings the bike to a sudden stop and she and Snake look back at it!
The hangar is an inferno! Soldiers run around trying to get away. Soldiers come running out of the hangar on fire.
Screams.
Soldiers' screams (background noise).

SOLDIER 1

*screams*

SOLDIER 2

*screams*

SOLDIER 3

*screams*

SOLDIER 4

*screams*
Another explosion! And another! A crane collapses.
Snake and EVA watch, dumbfounded.

SNAKE

EVA, how did you...

EVA

The Boss let me go.

SNAKE

The Boss...? But why?

EVA

I'll tell you later. Right now we've got to get to the lake and escape!

SNAKE

We can't leave yet! I've still got one last job to do...

EVA

... The Boss is already at the lake...

SNAKE

Huh?

EVA

She's at the lake.

EVA

She's waiting for you there...

SNAKE

Waiting for me?
EVA gets off the bike and gets close to Snake.

EVA

I was hoping I wouldn't have to tell you.

EVA

... I don't want you to fight her.

EVA

But... I

EVA

I've come to realize that there's a special relationship between you two.

EVA

Something I can't understand, something that goes beyond a man and a woman...
EVA turns her back to Snake.

EVA

I envy you...

EVA

Really, I do.

EVA

But... I guess I just can't understand it.

EVA

She asked me to tell you something.

EVA

I've never seen someone with such clear eyes.
EVA gets back on the bike.

EVA

There... I said it. (To herself.)

EVA

Ready to go?

SNAKE

*determined* Yeah.
Another massive explosion in the hangar! Followed by a rumbling in the ground! The giant Shagohod comes bursting out of the flames!

VOLGIN

Snake! It's not over yet!!!
Volgin is in the cockpit!
He's spotted Snake and EVA!

VOLGIN

There is no escape!!
The Shagohod closes in.

EVA

We failed!

SNAKE

Not good!

EVA

Hold on tight!
EVA revs the accelerator!
EVA floors it. Snake has to hang on so he doesn't fall off. The bike races off.
EVA and Snake escape on the bike, Volgin in the Shagohod in hot pursuit.
The bike weaves all through the fortress, but they can't shake the Shagohod as it continues to barrel after them, knocking parked tanks and armored vehicles out of its way. It even runs over soldiers and destroys armories, provisions storehouses, and other facilities as it closes in on the bike.
Bike Heads for Rail Bridge
3D Cutscene 1
3D cutscene (afternoon - change view button available)
EVA reaches the entrance to the fortress. She hits the brakes and does a U-turn, slowing down dramatically. The Shagohod continues to approach, tearing through buildings.

EVA

I can't shake him!

SNAKE

The RPG can't put a dent in that armor.

EVA

Let's head for the rail bridge.

SNAKE

The bridge?I thought you rigged it with C3!

EVA

I did. We'll lure him on to the bridge...

SNAKE

... then blow him up along with it. Good plan.

EVA

The bridge is on the other side of the runway. We'll have to cut through the middle of the base. You ready?

SNAKE

Step on it!! If he catches up to us, we're done for!
Bullets come flying at the bike, interrupting their conversation, but none of them hit them.
Up ahead, they see Ocelot with his two revolvers.
EVA pays no mind to him.

EVA

OK, here we go!
She races off again.

OCELOT

Urgh!
Ocelot holsters his guns.
He jumps on a bike (no sidecar) parked nearby.
Ocelot does a big jump to take a shortcut! He's as good with a bike as EVA!
He pulls up beside EVA and Snake.
His bike is right next to EVA's. EVA attacks by crashing into him!
Snake collapses into the side seat.
Editor's Note: In the release version, Ocelot pulls up next to EVA's side, and she attacks him using her body.
She can't shake Ocelot. He aims a revolver.
EVA draws her Mauser and fires one-handed! The muzzle flashes right in front of Ocelot!
Ocelot attacks with his bike! EVA drops the Mauser.
Suddenly, Ocelot notices an obstacle ahead!
Snake destroys it with an RPG! The pieces blow apart in different directions.
Showered with debris, Ocelot stumbles and falls behind.
EVA and Snake take off even faster.
They race toward the rail bridge. The massive form of the Shagohod is still in hot pursuit.
WIG is Destroyed
3D Cutscene 1
3D cutscene (afternoon - change view button available)
EVA skillfully passes under the WIG. The Shagohod charges straight ahead, sending the humongous WIG flying. Its wings come clean off, it turns over, then slides along the ground before coming to a stop. The final shot will have the same composition as the only photo of that famous Soviet WIG.
The bike continues on straight ahead. The Shagohod falls a little behind.

VOLGIN

I've got a surprise for you! You won't be getting away this time!
Volgin presses a certain switch.
The Shagohod transforms into Rocket Booster mode (Phase 2).
The rockets go full blast! The sound of the turbo is tremendous.
Volgin knows Ocelot is near the boosters.
Ocelot tries to get close, but he gets a full dose of the combusting booster.

OCELOT

*screams*
Ocelot gets burned. He curses! Volgin smiles. (This was payback for what he did during Volgin's duel with Snake.)

OCELOT

Son of a BITCH!!! (Spoken like an American.)
Ocelot inadvertently lets some American English slip out as he falls a little off course. He's lagging behind again.
The Shagohod accelerates! It looks like it's going to catch up to the bike!
Despite enemy units and the Shagohod on their tail, EVA and Snake make it to the rail bridge.
Bike Reaches Rail Bridge
3D Cutscene 1
3D cutscene (afternoon - change view button available)
This is just before they clear the runway. Segues into cutscene. Up ahead is the large rail bridge.
EVA slams on the brakes, leaving rubber marks on the runway. Smoke rises from the ground too! The camera cranes up to show the bridge.
EVA and Snake look back. They see the Shagohod coming barreling toward them.

EVA

Snake, we've only got one chance!

EVA

We'll try to lure him over towards the other side.

EVA

When the Shagohod is on the bridge, shoot the explosives.

EVA

The bomb is planted on the strut of the bridge.
The camera shows the bombs on the bridge. Snake can be using either the RPG or the sniper rifle.
Shagohod and pursuing soldiers approach.
EVA looks ahead. The rail bridge extends straight in front of them.

EVA

Let's go!
The bike races off!!
EVA and Snake clear the rail bridge.
Before Rail Bridge Explodes
3D Cutscene 1
3D cutscene (afternoon - change view button available)
The bike clears the bridge and comes to a sudden stop on the other side. Snake and EVA jump out. The Shagohod is just about the enter the bridge. EVA is in front of the bike, providing backup as a spotter. She takes out her own pair of binoculars.
Snake gets out the bike and readies his sniper rifle or RPG. Even if the player ran out of ammo prior to this, he'll have ammo on him. If he runs out of that, EVA will provide more.
Snake successfully snipes the C3 planted on the rail bridge in masterful fashion.
Rail Bridge Explodes
3D Cutscene 1
3D cutscene (afternoon - change view button available)
The Shagohod drives onto the bridge. The bombs explode! The massive rail bridge goes up in a giant explosion!
A huge ball of fire rises! Bikes and sidecar soldiers that were behind the Shagohod get swallowed up by the flames. Show the scale of the explosion with a wide shot.
The bridge collapses.
Ocelot stops just in time to avoid being caught up in the carnage.

OCELOT

*groans*
He drops the revolver in his hand. It disappears down into the canyon. He only has one left now.

OCELOT

*frustrated grunt*
EVA can't help but do a little celebrating.

EVA

We did it!
The bridge explodes, soldiers on it, and collapses. Something resembling the Shagohod (Phase 2 equipment/lower body) falls below. It's hard to make things out with all the black smoke. The Shagohod's rocket boosters drop into the canyon, hitting the ground and catching fire, triggering another explosion! Black smoke envelopes the sky.

EVA

Wow.

SNAKE

It's over.
Snake and EVA rejoice.
But then, EVA points at the sky in shock.

EVA

Look!
The top half of the Shagohod (regular armament) comes jumping out of the sky (from within the smoke).
Its forearm sections land right in front of Snake and EVA. The ground shakes, and a cloud of dust is kicked up.
They're dumbstruck.
The Shagohod activates its forearms, and pulls itself up. It's like the machine is doing a push-up.
Volgin's voice booms!

VOLGIN

I'm not finished yet!!
EVA and Snake jump back on the bike. They stare at each other for a moment, preparing themselves for what's coming.

SNAKE

EVA, you take care of the driving.

EVA

Yeah?

SNAKE

Yeah. I trust you. On one condition, though... leave the fighting to me.

EVA

You got it. I was getting tired of running away anyway.

SNAKE

Eva... let's do it.
EVA gives Snake a kiss, whether he wanted one or not.
Snake is caught off-guard. He looks at EVA.

EVA

For luck!

SNAKE

Here goes!
Snake readies his RPG! EVA races off toward the giant Shagohod!
EVA and Snake fight the Shagohod from the bike and sidecar. After a certain number of RPG blasts, the Shagohod finally stops moving.
Shagohod Battle Interlude
3D Cutscene 1
3D cutscene (afternoon - change view button available)
Black smoke rises from the Shagohod. It comes to a stop, and doesn't move for a bit. EVA stops the bike, and she and Snake watch to see what will happen.

EVA

Did we beat him?
EVA asks Snake.

SNAKE

No.
The Shagohod starts moving again. Its forearm sections separate and are launched from the main body. This mini, escape pod type Shagohod is quite fast and nimble. Its mobility is extraordinary.

EVA

Wow.
EVA gives Snake an order.

EVA

Get off!

SNAKE

What!?

EVA

I'm going to lure it back here.

SNAKE

You're going to use yourself as bait? Are you insane!?

EVA

*jokes to make Snake listen to her* I'm used to this guy -- I know how to handle him!

EVA

*taunting Volgin in the Shagohod* Come on, you blockhead!
The Shagohod approaches the bike!
Snake rolls out of the sidecar like someone doing an ukemi (a martial arts breakfall). Simultaneously, EVA races off, and the Shagohod drives over the spot where they were a split-second earlier.
EVA fires a warning shot at the Shagohod (to get Volgin's attention).
The Shagohod repositions itself, then takes off toward EVA's bike.
Snake gets up. EVA gives him an emphatic thumbs-up and hits the throttle. She stands the bike up on its back wheel and blasts off!
After getting up, Snake aims his RPG-7.
Now out of the sidecar, Snake at last destroys the Shagohod.
Shagohod Battle End
3D Cutscene 1
3D cutscene (afternoon - change view button available)
The Shagohod suffers an internal explosion!
More black smoke. The machine comes to a rest. Snake waits to see what will happen. EVA stops her bike next to Snake. She grips his hand.
EVA can't hide her unease.
Neither of them takes their eyes off the Shagohod.
A battered Volgin emerges from its cockpit. His red rubber suit is ripped, making him nearly naked from the waist up. However, he's bleeding so much that his body and face are red from all the blood.

VOLGIN

Snake!!
Volgin discharges electrical arcs. The slight drizzle that's been falling turns into heavy rain.
Volgin looks up at the rainy sky. The rubber suit that protects him from electrocution is in tatters.
Volgin's inner flesh is exposed. Sparks continually shoot out of him like a piece of broken electrical equipment. There's a rumble of thunder.

VOLGIN

Who's afraid of a little thunder?
The rain grows even more intense. Volgin looks at Snake and smiles.
Then, a bolt of lightning scores a direct hit on Volgin!

VOLGIN

*screams*
Volgin bursts into flames! His heart stops while he's still standing. He doesn't move. He then turns into a column of fire, burning bright red! The cartridges on the belt wrapped around his body all shoot at once!
One after the other come explosions that look like stunning fireworks!
EVA looks away.

SNAKE

Fried by a bolt of lightning... a fitting end.
Snake drops the RPG-7 to the ground.

SNAKE

It's finally over...
Snake's words give EVA her first feeling of relief.
EVA falls into Snake's chest. They hold each other tight, not saying a word.
Behind them, the explosions that resemble fireworks continue.
The rain is back to a drizzle. If the player goes into First Person View, they can see The Sorrow in the rain.
The Sorrow is smiling (with no bloody tear either).
The rain lets up.
A tear rolls down EVA's cheek.
They embrace for a little while.
But then comes a familiar warbling sound of metal.
Out of the rising black smoke, flying platforms come shooting over.

EVA

No time for this now...

EVA

The escape craft is just up ahead. Let's get going.
The pursuit team has finally arrived.
EVA gets on the bike, and Snake jumps in the sidecar.
The flying platforms close in. On either side of them are bike soldiers too. They crossed over here using another bridge.
The bike takes off.
Footnotes
1Real name Margaretha Geertruida Zelle (1876 – 1917). Famous for being an alleged female spy during World War I, though the truth remains unclear. After learning exotic dancing while accompanying her husband to his new post in Java, she returned home and found overnight success as a dancer. Mata Hari went on to have relationships with military officers from many countries in Europe, which led to allegations of espionage. She was executed by firing squad.
2See the Major Zero Radio Conversation: Cynthia (p. 479) for details.
Radio Conversations
•Major
Prior to Infiltrating Fortress Again
EVA rendezvous
(1)

ZERO

Snake, I see you've recovered your weapons and equipment.

SNAKE

Now I can finally go on the offensive.

ZERO

Time to pay Volgin back for what he did to you.

SNAKE

Yeah. And then some.

ZERO

But first you've got to destroy the Shagohod.
(2)

ZERO

The Shagohod is in the hangar in the main wing of the weapons lab. Go back to Groznyj Grad, make your way into the hangar, and destroy the Shagohod.
(3)

ZERO

You can get back into Groznyj Grad by going to the end of the cave behind the waterfall. Head back to Groznyj Grad.
EVA's "I'll be your eyes" remark

ZERO

"I'll be your eyes"... makes me want to cry.

SNAKE

Why's that?

ZERO

It reminds me of something a certain spy once said.

ZERO

His name was Oleg Penkovsky, a Western spy who worked inside GRU. He was arrested by the KGB and executed last year.

ZERO

They say he sent a letter to the DCI at the time, saying, "I must remain on this front line in order to be your eyes and ears."

ZERO

His code name was "Hero."

SNAKE

A hero whose name will never be known.

ZERO

Yes. That's the world we live in.
Cynthia

ZERO

The Cynthia that EVA mentioned was a famous lady spy who worked for Britain during the Second World War.

ZERO

Her real name was Amy Elizabeth Thorpe. She was a lovely, intelligent woman, and she used those charms as a weapon to extract numerous secrets from the enemy.

ZERO

They say her most brilliant achievement was getting the French Vichy government's naval ciphers.

ZERO

But don't let yourself be taken in by EVA's charms.

SNAKE

I'll be careful.
After waterfall - check your equipment
(1)

ZERO

Huh? Snake, take a look in your backpack.

SNAKE

What the... My food's gone!
(2)

SNAKE

I busted my ass to get those snakes... And now I won't get a chance to eat them...!!
(3)

SNAKE

Major!! What the hell is going on here!?

ZERO

Don't ask me. Ask EVA.

SNAKE

*angry* EVA...!
•EVA
Prior to Infiltrating Fortress Again
After waterfall rendezvous - head deeper into the cave

EVA

There's a ladder at the back of the cave behind the waterfall that will take you up into the fortress. Head to the back of the cave.
After waterfall rendezvous - deepest part of the cave

EVA

That ladder there will take you up into the southwestern part of Groznyj Grad. Climb the ladder.
All the food is gone
(1)

SNAKE

EVA, about the contents of the backpack you got for me...
(2)
*If player didn't have Instant Noodles

EVA

Is something wrong with it?

SNAKE

The food is all gone.

EVA

Oh.

SNAKE

Did you eat it?

EVA

Of course not! Why would I?

SNAKE

Then who did?
(3)
*If player had Instant Noodles

EVA

*alarmed* Is there something missing?

SNAKE

Yeah, all of my food.

EVA

*shaken, but attempts to dodge* Well, how strange...

SNAKE

*realizing it was probably EVA* You didn't...

EVA

It wasn't me!

SNAKE

...

EVA

All those snakes and crocodiles and suspicious-looking mushrooms... I wouldn't eat that stuff even if you paid me!

SNAKE

What about the instant noodles?

EVA

...

SNAKE

EVA...

EVA

I was hungry, OK!? Give me a break! It's just a little packet of noodles...

SNAKE

It wasn't just the noodles. All those animals I worked so hard to capture...

EVA

That wasn't me.

SNAKE

So who was it?
(4)

EVA

It was Ocelot.

SNAKE

Ocelot?

EVA

He said he wanted to eat the same things you did. (Since he's taken with him.)

SNAKE

Why would he do that?

EVA

You haven't figured it out?

SNAKE

No.

EVA

You are dense.

SNAKE

*has no idea what she's talking about* ...???
Watch out for Ocelot

SNAKE

EVA, what happened to Ocelot?

EVA

*teases* Can't get enough of him, huh?

SNAKE

*ignores* He doesn't trust you.

EVA

I know. So it's me you're worried about, then?

SNAKE

EVA... (You need to take this seriously.)

EVA

I'm fine. I know how to handle him.

EVA

Besides, I think he's got his mind set on someone else right about now.

SNAKE

?

EVA

Figure it out.
Stolen from a safe (2)

SNAKE

EVA, about this explosive...

EVA

The C3?

SNAKE

Yeah. Wasn't this stuff developed in the States?

EVA

That's right.

SNAKE

So where did you get it?

EVA

There's a vault full of Western weapons used for research purposes.

SNAKE

And you stole it from there?

EVA

Yep.
-->EVA's Radio Conversation: Stolen from a safe
The Shagohod data

SNAKE

EVA, that Shagohod data you got from Sokolov...

EVA

Uh huh.

SNAKE

Are you really going to give it to Khrushchev?

EVA

You think I'm going to answer that?

SNAKE

I know I want you to answer me.

EVA

You're asking me for something I can't give you.

SNAKE

EVA

Snake, I have a mission to carry out, just like you. Please, try to understand...

SNAKE

The button camera

SNAKE

EVA, didn't you take a picture of me when I was about to leave the waterfall cave?

EVA

Oh, that. That's a button-shaped hidden camera developed by the KGB. I use it to take pictures of the fortress and the Shagohod and...

SNAKE

That's not what I wanted to know. Why did you take a picture of me?

EVA

Because I wanted a picture of you.

SNAKE

...

EVA

... If I told you why, would you believe me anyway?

SNAKE

...
•Sigint
Prior to Infiltrating Fortress Again
Liquid fuel

SIGINT

That idea Sokolov had of planting C3 on the liquid fuel tanks... not a bad idea.

SIGINT

The fuel he was referring to is probably UDMH - unsymmetrical dimethyl hydrazine.

SIGINT

It's highly flammable, but difficult to handle. If you can blow it all up at once with C3, it'll take the entire weapons lab with it, no doubt.

SIGINT

But that's only if you manage to plant the C3 in the right place on each tank. So don't screw it up.
•Major
Prior to Infiltrating Hangar
Head for weapons lab east wing
(1)

ZERO

Snake, you've got to destroy the Shagohod. It's located in the hangar in the main wing of the weapons lab.
(2)
Radio Miniscreen Video.

ZERO

To get into the hangar, use the door just inside the main wing as you enter it from the second floor of the east wing.
(3)

ZERO

You can enter the main wing from the west side of the second floor. Head for the main wing.
(4)

ZERO

Start out by heading for the east wing of the weapons lab.
(5)

ZERO

The east wing is to the northeast of your location. Head northeast.
(6)

ZERO

The east wing is to the north of your location. Head north.
Infiltrating fortress again - closed manhole

ZERO

There's a truck parked over the manhole huh? I guess you won't be able to use that anymore.

ZERO

But there's no need for you to go back to the cave anyway. Your goal is to destroy the Shagohod. Head for the hangar in the main wing of the weapons lab.
•EVA
Prior to Infiltrating Hangar
How to get to weapons lab

EVA

The Shagohod is in the hangar of the main wing of the weapons lab.

EVA

You can get into the hangar through the door located at the entrance to the main wing on the second floor of the east wing.

EVA

Hurry!
How to infiltrate weapons lab

EVA

The only way for you to sneak into the east wing of the weapons lab is through the entrance.

EVA

Speaking of which, I sometimes see trucks going in and out through there. If you can sneak onto one of those trucks somehow...
Infiltrating fortress again - current status

SNAKE

EVA, what's your status?

EVA

I'm on my way to the rail bridge.

SNAKE

OK. When you're done planting the C3 on the bridge...

EVA

I know the plan. We'll meet up at the lake. You stay focused, too.
Infiltrating fortress again - Raikov disguise won't work

EVA

Snake, they know you disguised yourself as Raikov to get in last time.

EVA

And besides, you lost the hat, so I don't think the disguise is going to work anymore.
•Major
Prior to Finishing Planting C3s
Plant the C3
(1)

ZERO

Snake, your job is to plant the C3 charges on the liquid fuel tanks.

ZERO

There are four liquid fuel tanks. You need to place a C3 charge on each of them. The tanks should all be located close to the Shagohod.
(2)
*After one C3 planted

ZERO

You've got three more tanks to plant C3 on.
(3)
*After two C3s planted

ZERO

You've still got two more tanks to plant C3 on. Hurry!
(4)
*After three C3s planted

ZERO

One more tank remains. You're almost there.
Watch out for liquid fuel explosions

ZERO

Snake, be careful when you approach the liquid fuel tanks.

ZERO

Apparently even the smallest disturbance will cause them to explode. Don't use firearms near the tanks.
•EVA
Prior to Finishing Planting C3s
Hangar - C3
(1)

EVA

It looks like you made it inside the hangar, huh.
(2)

EVA

Plant the C3 charges on the liquid fuel tanks. There are four tanks in all.
(3)

EVA

If one of the C3 charges you planted is dismantled by the enemy, your mission is over.

EVA

Try to plant the C3 someplace out of the way where it won't be seen.

EVA

If it looks like an enemy is about to find a charge, take him down immediately.

EVA

And if the enemy sees you planting the C3, show's over, folks. So don't plant the charges in Alert Phase. Got it?
(4)

EVA

Once you've finished planting C3 on all four tanks, turn the timer on.

EVA

When the count reaches zero, all of the C3 charges will explode at once.

EVA

Once the timer has started, there's no way to stop it. Make sure you're out of there by the time it reaches zero, got it?
A day off for the scientists

SNAKE

EVA, remember how you said today was a day of rest for the scientists in the hangar?

EVA

Yeah.

SNAKE

What did you mean by that?

EVA

Until yesterday, there were tons of scientists and maintenance personnel working in the hangar.

EVA

But because Volgin was forcing them to work day and night, a lot of the scientists were collapsing from exhaustion.

EVA

So now that the prototype is finished and things are a little less hectic, they gave the scientists a day to rest.

SNAKE

I see.

EVA

If they were still working like that, it would have been impossible for you to sneak into the hangar.

EVA

But this doesn't mean the hangar is completely deserted. I'm pretty sure there are still a few guards and maintenance personnel left. Stay alert.
Hangar - first C3 planted
(1)
*After one C3 planted

EVA

You've planted 1 C3 charge. That leaves 3 more.
(2)

SNAKE

How are things on your end?

EVA

I'm planting the C3 on the rail bridge now. Don't screw up, OK?

SNAKE

Hey, not a problem.
Checking escape route

SNAKE

EVA.

EVA

What's up?

SNAKE

About our escape plan...

EVA

Uh huh...

SNAKE

How exactly are you planning to get to the lake?

EVA

What, don't you trust me?

SNAKE

That's not what I meant.

EVA

OK, then. I'll explain it to you.

EVA

To the north of Groznygrad, there's a forest called Lazorevo.

EVA

The name Lazorevo means "the lush green earth."

EVA

On the other side of Lazorevo is a large forest called Zaozyorje.

EVA

Zaozyorje means "near the lake" in Russian. The lake is just beyond Zaozyorje.

EVA

And the name of that lake is Rokovoj Bereg, "the lake of destiny."

SNAKE

That's where you hid the WIG?

EVA

Yeah. We'll use it to make our getaway.

EVA

Once we've completed our missions, that is.
•Sigint
Prior to Finishing Planting C3s
C3 advice

SIGINT

Snake, you've got to plant that C3 you got from EVA on the liquid fuel tanks.

SIGINT

But you've got just barely enough for the job. Make sure you don't plant it anywhere but on the tanks.

SIGINT

And even if you plant it in the right place, it'll all be for nothing if the enemy finds it. Try to plant the C3 as far away from prying eyes as possible.

SIGINT

Once you've planted all the C3 charges, flip the switch on the detonation timer.

SIGINT

The countdown will start right away. When it hits zero, the whole hangar goes sky-high. You better be out of there before that happens.
Watch out for liquid fuel explosions

SIGINT

Snake, like I told you before, you gotta be careful when you get close to those liquid fuel tanks.

SIGINT

The tanks are full of UDMH - unsymmetrical dimethyl hydrazine. It's used in rocket and missile propulsion systems.

SIGINT

Mess with a tank and BOOM! You're confetti.

SIGINT

So do me a favor, and don't shoot or throw grenades at any of the liquid fuel tanks.
•Major
Colonel Volgin Battle
Volgin battle - basics

ZERO

Snake, watch out for Volgin's electric shock attacks.

ZERO

If you're shocked while equipping a gun, the bullets inside the magazine will ignite and the gun will explode!

ZERO

But he should be vulnerable just after launching a series of shock attacks. Avoid the attacks and either shoot him from his blind side, or engage him directly with punches or CQC.

ZERO

And don't forget that the timer is still ticking on the C3 detonators. When it reaches zero, it's all over. You've got to finish him off before then!
Volgin battle - time bombs

ZERO

Snake, don't forget that the timer is still ticking on the C3 detonators.

ZERO

You must defeat Volgin and escape from the hangar before that count reaches zero. Get to it!
Volgin battle - Ocelot

ZERO

Snake, don't concern yourself with Ocelot up there. Concentrate on defeating Volgin!
Volgin battle - after announcement
After announcement over the loudspeakers about the C3 being discovered

SNAKE

Major, they found the C3...

ZERO

I heard.

ZERO

But I don't think they've found all of them yet. And even if they have found them, they may not be able to disarm them.

ZERO

Don't worry about the C3. Concentrate on defeating Volgin!
Volgin battle - you're nearly out of time
*If there's under 1 minute remaining

ZERO

Snake, look at the countdown timer. The bombs are about to explode! Hurry and finish him off!!
•Para-Medic
Colonel Volgin Battle
Volgin battle - electrical paralysis

PARA-MEDIC

If you get hit by one of Volgin's electric shock attacks, you'll be temporarily paralyzed. Be careful!
Volgin battle - electrical burns

PARA-MEDIC

Volgin's electric attacks are intense. If he attacks you at point-blank range, you could get burned.

PARA-MEDIC

If you get burned, go into the Survival Viewer and treat it using "CURE"!
Volgin battle - total body electrical discharges

PARA-MEDIC

When Volgin is discharging electricity from his body, you'll get electrocuted just by touching him. So you can't grab him with CQC.

PARA-MEDIC

When Volgin isn't discharging electricity, however, that's your chance to use CQC.

PARA-MEDIC

Attack Volgin whenever you see an opening.
Volgin battle - Raiden mask
(1)

PARA-MEDIC

Snake what if you put on that mask? You might just be able to shake Volgin up! (If the player puts on the disguise mask resembling Volgin's lover, Raikov, Volgin will be reminded of him and momentarily hesitate.)
(2)

SNAKE

Shake him up? Why!?

PARA-MEDIC

Never mind. Just do it!
Volgin battle - frogs
*If player has a tree frog
(1)

PARA-MEDIC

Snake, Volgin said he hates rain, right? If you show him something that reminds him of rain, it might shake him up a little.
(2)

PARA-MEDIC

How about a tree frog?
Volgin battle - time's running out

PARA-MEDIC

Snake, you're running out of time! The C3 is about to explode!! Hurry up and defeat Volgin!!
•Sigint
Colonel Volgin Battle
Volgin battle - vulnerable after electrical attacks

SIGINT

After Volgin unleashes his electric shock attack, you'll have a split-second opening. Use it to attack him!
Volgin battle - weapons will explode from electrical attacks

SIGINT

Watch out for Volgin's electric shock attacks! If he shocks you when you've got a gun equipped, the ammo in the magazine's gonna ignite and the gun will explode.

SIGINT

Either fight without a gun equipped, or quickly press the Weapon Window Button to unequip your weapon when you're about to get zapped.
Volgin battle - Bullet Punches

SIGINT

Volgin uses a technique where he holds a rifle bullet between his fingers and punches his opponent while simultaneously causing the bullet to explode with an electric shock.

SIGINT

It's a punch, an electric shock, and a rifle shot all rolled up into one. You've seen the damage it can do - it'll tear you apart if it connects. Dodge and weave, Snake!
Volgin battle - gunfire

SIGINT

Volgin can use an electric shock to detonate the gunpowder inside an ammunition cartridge. In other words, he can fire a bullet with his bare hands.

SIGINT

If he starts to ignite bullets in your direction, take cover! You'll get nailed if you just stand there!
Volgin battle - electrical attack barrier

SIGINT

Volgin seems to be deflecting bullets away by wrapping a powerful electromagnetic field around his body.

SIGINT

You won't hit him if you fire at him from the front. If you're going to attack him with a gun, do it from the side or the back.
Volgin battle - chaff

SIGINT

Snake, try using a chaff grenade. The metal foil it scatters into the air should dissipate electric shocks and make them less painful.
Volgin battle - time's running out

SIGINT

Snake, time is running out! Hurry up and take him down!
•Major
Prior to Reaching Rail Bridge
Why the C3 didn't blow up the hangar
(1)

SNAKE

Major.

ZERO

Snake, are you all right!?

SNAKE

Yeah.
(2)

ZERO

The explosion went off successfully.

SNAKE

Yeah, but the hangar is still standing.
-->Sigint Radio Conversation: Why the C3 didn't blow up the hangar (2)
Sidecar - you don't have to take them all out

ZERO

Snake, your ultimate objective is to escape. There's no need to defeat every last enemy.

ZERO

Rather than attacking the enemies you've put behind you, focus on dispatching the ones that are blocking the way in front of you.
Sidecar - keep an eye on EVA

ZERO

Snake, keep an eye on EVA's LIFE as well. If she is killed, you're finished.

ZERO

Make sure you don't shoot EVA by mistake!
Sidecar - watchtowers

ZERO

Watch out for those guard towers. You don't want them sniping at you from above. If you see an enemy in one of the guard towers, take him out first!
Sidecar - first person attacks

ZERO

The enemy will be coming at you from all sides - front and back, left and right. Use First Person View to take them out. Listen closely to what EVA tells you!
Sidecar - obstacles

ZERO

Snake, you must destroy all the objects that block the sidecar's path. Do as EVA tells you!
Sidecar - attacked EVA

ZERO

Snake! Why are you attacking EVA!?

PARA-MEDIC

What were you thinking!? I thought you were better than that!

SIGINT

I can't believe you, man!! You got a lot of nerve pulling something like that!

ZERO

Pull yourself together and focus on the enemy! That's an order!!
Sidecar - use the drums

ZERO

You can blow up the drums placed throughout the fortress by shooting them. That should trip the enemy up a bit. Aim for the drums!
Sidecar - before the runway

ZERO

It looks like the Shagohod's fallen quite far behind. You're in the barracks area now. In just a few moments, you'll come upon Groznyj Grad's northern runway.

ZERO

Keep going! You're almost there!
Sidecar - Shagohod
*When calling from the runway
(1)

SNAKE

Major, the Shagohod...! (It's coming.)

ZERO

Yes, I know.
(2)

ZERO

Pummel the Shagohod with the RPG-7! Even if you can't destroy it, you should at least be able to slow it down. Whatever you do, don't let it catch up to you!!
Sidecar - head for the rail bridge
(1)

SNAKE

Major, we're about to head for the rail bridge.

ZERO

So I heard. You're going to take out the bridge and the Shagohod with it, eh? Nice plan.
(2)

ZERO

Let EVA do the driving. Concentrate on fending off your pursuers. You've got to make it to that bridge somehow!
(3)
*Second and subsequent times – before dialogue about destroying the bridge and dropping the Shagohod into the canyon

ZERO

Snake, if you can take out the Shagohod that Volgin is in, the world will be safe from that monstrosity of a weapon.

ZERO

But you won't to be able to take it down with the weapons you have on you. You have to come up with something else. It's time to rethink your plan of attack.

ZERO

First, get out of there. You need to shake your pursuers.
(4)

ZERO

Snake, leave the driving to EVA.

ZERO

You concentrate on fending off your pursuers and clearing the way for her.

ZERO

Don't worry about running out of ammunition - the sidecar seems to be loaded with plenty of it. Use First Person View to eliminate your attackers!
(5)
*Second and subsequent times – after dialogue about destroying the bridge and dropping the Shagohod into the canyon

ZERO

Snake, if you can take out the Shagohod that Volgin is in at the bridge, the world will be safe from that monstrosity of a weapon.

ZERO

Now hurry up and get to the bridge!
Sidecar - runway

ZERO

Good, you've reached the runway. The rail bridge is just up ahead. You've got to hold on until you reach the bridge!
Sidecar - runway Shagohod

ZERO

Snake, the Shagohod is coming up behind you! It'll overtake you unless you do something!

ZERO

Attack it with the RPG-7! You might not be able to destroy it, but you can certainly slow it down!
•Para-Medic
Prior to Reaching Rail Bridge
Sidecar - general

PARA-MEDIC

Snake, the enemy is hot in pursuit. If they catch up to you, you're dead! You've got to get away from them!!
Sidecar - LIFE recovery

PARA-MEDIC

While you're riding in the sidecar, lying down won't cause your LIFE to recover gradually like usual.

PARA-MEDIC

If you need to restore LIFE, use the LIFE medicine!
Sidecar - EVA's LIFE recovery

PARA-MEDIC

You can treat EVA's wounds by selecting "EVA" from the "CURE" screen in the Survival Viewer. If she gets injured, see to her right away. Got it?
•Sigint
Prior to Reaching Rail Bridge
Sidecar - get outta there

SIGINT

Snake, leave the driving to EVA and focus on attacking.

SIGINT

Use First Person View to pick off the enemies around you.
Sidecar - sidecar enemies

SIGINT

If you've got a sidecar on your tail, you should take out the enemy in the side seat first. That'll take a big chunk out of its firepower.
Sidecar - Shagohod machine guns

SIGINT

The Shagohod's machine gun has some wicked firepower. But you should be able to mess with its targeting system by shooting at the gun itself.

SIGINT

If the machine gun starts strafing you, return fire!
Sidecar - Shagohod missile A

SIGINT

The Shagohod's missiles are radio-guided. You can disable the guidance system with a chaff grenade. Try it out!

SIGINT

If it's too late to use chaff, shoot it down with your gun. I know that sounds kind of crazy, but if anyone can do it, you can!
Sidecar - Shagohod ramming attack

SIGINT

If the Shagohod tries to bump into you, hammer on it with the RPG-7 or a grenade!

SIGINT

Even if you can't destroy it, you should at least be able to trip it up a little!
Why the C3 didn't blow up the hangar
(1)

SIGINT

Snake, the C3 exploded without a hitch.

SNAKE

Yeah, but the hangar is still intact.
(2)

SIGINT

The explosion was smaller than what we had hoped for because the fuel tanks didn't catch on fire.

SNAKE

But the fuel tanks were definitely... (blown up)

SIGINT

Remember how the enemy spotted the C3 while you were busy with Volgin?

SIGINT

They must have called in the EOD to remove the fuel from the tanks then.

SIGINT

But still, the C3 alone should've been enough to take out the manufacturing line.

SIGINT

That'll probably be the last one they'll ever make. You succeeded in preventing its mass production.
(3)
*If player called Sigint

SIGINT

Now you just have to do something about the one that Volgin is riding in. It's all yours!
•Major
Prior to Destroying Rail Bridge
Rail bridge - shoot
(1)

ZERO

Snake, when the Shagohod approaches the bridge, that's your cue to start sniping the C3 bombs planted on the struts.
(2)

ZERO

Use the SVD.
Rail bridge - C3 locations
(1)

ZERO

The C3 bombs are planted on the support beams on the front center side of the bridge.
(2)
*Normal difficulty

ZERO

There appears to be a total of two bombs.
*Hard difficulty

ZERO

EVA appears to have planted three bombs.
*Extreme difficulty

ZERO

EVA has planted a total of four bombs.
(3)
*If there are 3 C3s left

ZERO

Three more to go.
(4)
*If there are 2 C3s left

ZERO

Two more to go.
(5)
*If there is 1 C3 left

ZERO

One more left.
(6)

ZERO

Concentrate on your target. You must destroy the bridge before the Shagohod makes it across!
Rail bridge - timing

ZERO

You'll be crushed if the Shagohod makes it across the bridge. On the other hand, if you blow it up it too early, the plan will be a failure.

ZERO

Wait until the Shagohod is on top of the rail bridge to shoot the C3 bombs and destroy it.
Rail bridge - time is almost up

ZERO

Hurry, Snake! The Shagohod is about to reach the other side! Shoot the C3 bombs, quickly!!
•Para-Medic
Prior to Destroying Rail Bridge
Rail bridge sniping - general

PARA-MEDIC

Snake, you have to shoot all those C3 charges before the Shagohod gets across the bridge. Aim carefully!
Rail bridge sniping - Pentazemin (1)
*If player has Pentazemin

PARA-MEDIC

You can take pentazemin to keep your hands from shaking.
Rail bridge sniping - down to the wire

PARA-MEDIC

Snake! The Shagohod (is going to cross the bridge)!! There's no time left!! Blow up the bridge, quick!!
•Sigint
Prior to Destroying Rail Bridge
Rail bridge sniping - shoot
(1)

SIGINT

Snake, snipe the C3 bombs planted on the rail bridge to blow it up.
(2)

SIGINT

Normally, C3 is a chemically stable material. It's only when it receives a shock from the outside that it turns into an explosive.

SIGINT

EVA's probably set those bombs up with detonators so they go off when they're disturbed by something.

SIGINT

She must have done it to prevent them from being disarmed. Man, she thought of everything.
(3)

SIGINT

Shooting those C3 bombs should set off the detonators and take the bridge down.

SIGINT

Either the SVD or the RPG-7 would be good for this job. If you're really a hot shot, you can use an assault rifle or a handgun, too.

SIGINT

Just don't let me catch you using a tranquilizer gun.

SIGINT

Clear your mind and focus on making the shot.
Rail bridge sniping - time's running out

SIGINT

Snake, the Shagohod is about to cross the bridge! There's no time to lose! Hurry up and snipe those bombs!
•Major
Shagohod Battle
Shagohod battle 1 - basics
(1)

ZERO

Snake, the rear frame of the Shagohod was destroyed when the bridge collapsed. The backside of the front frame is now exposed.
(2)

ZERO

Even the Shagohod is bound to have less armor plating on its backside. I'm sure you can penetrate it with the RPG-7.

ZERO

Attack the Shagohod from behind with the RPG-7!
Shagohod battle 1 - its "feet"
(1)

ZERO

The area around the Shagohod's underbody seems to have sustained heavy damage as well.

ZERO

By hitting its base with the RPG-7 or a grenade, you can force it to change direction.

ZERO

That will surely make it easier to get behind it. Aim for the base!
(2)

ZERO

Watch out when you attack the Shagohod's feet. You might get trampled if you get too close.

ZERO

Only attack its feet from a distance.
•Para-Medic
Shagohod Battle
Shagohod battle - EVA

PARA-MEDIC

Snake, pay attention to EVA's LIFE gauge. Make sure you don't attack her by mistake!
Shagohod battle - serious injuries

PARA-MEDIC

The Shagohod's weapons are deadly. You're likely to get seriously hurt if you get caught in its sights.

PARA-MEDIC

If you get injured, go into the Survival Viewer and take care of it immediately!
•Sigint
Shagohod Battle
Both Shagohod battles - machine guns

SIGINT
